channel.title: Really annoying it froze!
channel.description: :mad: Well i've downloaded lots of source deltascape,potterscape,dizzescape all i like just 1 thing if i made myself admin and do command like for dizzee i made ::pickup #idofitem and amount then it froze i need to restart all over tell me whats the problem and how to solve it thanks :P

item.title: Really annoying it froze!
item.dc:creator: @Brenz Brenz
item.description:
@Brenz wrote:

[quote=“empir3z, post:1, topic:231081”]:mad: Well i’ve downloaded lots of source deltascape,potterscape,dizzescape all i like just 1 thing if i made myself admin and do command like for dizzee i made
::pickup #idofitem and amount then it froze i need to restart all over tell me whats the problem and how to solve it thanks :P[/quote]

Answer to that problem: It is an item but the client you are using doesnt have that item, therefore its giving you a black screen, when you get the black screen you can try using ::empty

Brendan

Read full topic

it will make character file,

Dizzlescape online Connection accepted from //////////. ID 1: Client type: high memory version ID 1: UserId: 74558541 kojomba: ID 1: signing to Dizzlescape. kojomba: character file not found. kojomba: moreinfo file not found. kojomba: ID 1: Loading finished.

Dizzlescape online Connection accepted from ///////: 2318. ID 1: Client type: high memory version ID 1: UserId: 74558541 kojomba: ID 1: signing to Dizzlescape.

item.title: Really annoying it froze!
item.dc:creator: @kojomba kojomba
item.description:
@kojomba wrote:

try this,
go in client.java search you pickup command

if (command.startsWith("pickup")

replace your pickup with this

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 0) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } else { sendMessage("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } }

and tell if it work

(::pickup 4151 1)

Read full topic
